name: POV Dungeon
description:
A Dungeon Crawler where you use your voice to traverse the dungeon!

Originally made For VR with the Oculus Quest 2 but it also works as a standalone PC build!

uses default microphone for input

PC Controls

WASD - move

Q/E - Turn

Hold Spacebar - input Voice 

Oculus Quest 2 Controls -

Left Stick - Move

Left Stick Click - Voice Input (Sometimes?)

A/B - Voice Input (Sometimes?)

Right Stick - Turn

Voice Command Cheat Sheet

Move + Direction(Forward,backward,lef,righ)

Turn + direction(left/right)

Open/Close Door

Pickup Dagger/Health Potion

Equip Dagger/Health Potion

Use Health Potion

Attack
